ZIB_DefCode: SNOMED CT: 365508006 Bevinding betreffende woon- en huisvestingssituatie
Commentaar: The housing record archetype is located within the Housing record cluster slot of Housing summary archetype.
Occurrence of Critical features and Feature name are fixed to 0..1. We had to update the occurrence of the parent in order to allow for more than one values. Refer to WoningAanpassing 2023

Insert a second dwelling archetype within Additional details cluster slot. Feature name variable is located within the Critical features cluster slot. Occurrence of variable Condition is fixed to 0..1. We had to update the occurrence of the parent in order to allow for more than one values .
